name: Versle
description:
Hi there! Welcome to Versle

You are competing against another person to be the first to 3 points! You can get points by guessing the correct word first in 6 attempts.

Each guess must be a valid 5 letter word and the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word. You'll also get to see how well your opponent is guessing next to the scoreboard!

If at any time you want to leave the game, hit the 🏳️ next to the room code and you can forfeit the match.

Let's look at an example


Here we have a green A that is in the correct spot.
We also have a yellow S. It's in the word, but not the right spot.
Finally, there are the grey B, E, and N, that are not in the word.

This is also playable at the official site!
